Thibaut Le Gouic

About Me

Hi, I am a Maitre de Conférence (Associate Professor) at the Institut de Mathématiques de Marseille and the Ecole Centrale de Marseille, since 2014. I am currently en détachement at the Mathematics Department at MIT.

Research Interest

I am interested at the interaction between statistics and metric geometry. More recently, I have been focusing my work on barycenter in geodesic spaces, and Wasserstein space in particular.
